name: Fx4 Add-on Manager - Tab Styled
description:
Additional in-content UI for Firefox 4.0's Add-on Manager tab.

The only original code (by me) in here is the part that changes the background image on the Add-on Manager tab.

Use with style 36216, from which I took the tab background image.
